File:Shine.ogg15 March 2004This track unlocks at the Duel Arena Hospital.122

Shine is a music track that is unlocked north of the Duel Arena facilities, around the Mage Training Arena.

Prior to an update on 28 April 2021, the track could be heard in the Duel Arena hospital and bank as well. However, it can still be heard there if using Classic music mode.

Location before 2021

Analysis[edit | edit source]

The music track begins with a strong and short-noted beat that is repeated during most of the song. Strings and percussion are added while maintaining a high-pitched melody. A piano plays the song's main tune at a high-pitched note. The tempo remains at a medium-fast beat throughout the tune. Synthesizers are included before the beat is changed. The bridge includes one of the signature tunes played in many of the desert songs and a slower, but still up-beat tune with a synthesizer and other instruments, before again returning to the main tune of the track a final time. At the very end, a crowd and several dongs can be heard.

Versions[edit | edit source]

Version Release Music Track
1 1 June 2004
2 6 March 2007

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Originally this track could only be unlocked in the Wilderness north of the Lumber Yard. Having also been added to the Duel Arena hospital, the original location was replaced with Forbidden on 18 May 2004.
  • Although the hint was changed to refer "at the Duel Arena Hospital" instead of "at the north of Duel Arena" after 28 April 2021, it is only correct on Classic music mode, as on Modern one, the track was completely wiped out from Duel Arena territory.

'''Shine''' is a [[music]] track that is unlocked north of the [[Duel Arena]] facilities, around the [[Mage Training Arena]].

Prior to an [[Update:Arceuus Spellbook Beta and A Kingdom Divided Preparation|update]] on [[28 April]] [[2021]], the track could be heard in the Duel Arena hospital and bank as well. However, it can still be heard there if using Classic music mode.

{{Map|3328,3264|3328,3328|3392,3328|3392,3264|plane=0|mapID=-1|mtype=polygon|smw=hist|caption=Location before 2021|align=left}}

==Analysis==
The music track begins with a strong and short-noted beat that is repeated during most of the song. Strings and percussion are added while maintaining a high-pitched melody. A piano plays the song's main tune at a high-pitched note. The tempo remains at a medium-fast beat throughout the tune. Synthesizers are included before the beat is changed. The bridge includes one of the signature tunes played in many of the desert songs and a slower, but still up-beat tune with a synthesizer and other instruments, before again returning to the main tune of the track a final time. At the very end, a crowd and several dongs can be heard.

*Although the hint was changed to refer "at the Duel Arena Hospital" instead of "at the north of Duel Arena" after [[28 April]] [[2021]], it is only correct on Classic music mode, as on Modern one, the track was completely wiped out from Duel Arena territory.
